mapper.select: SELECT SUB_CATEGORY_ID, FOREIGN_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME FROM SubCategory
SELECT SUB_CATEGORY_ID, FOREIGN_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME FROM SubCategory WHERE SUB_CATEGORY_ID = #{subCategoryId}

SELECT mc.MAIN_CATEGORY_ID AS mainCategoryId, -- 메인 카테고리 ID 추가 sc.SUB_CATEGORY_ID AS subCategoryId, sc.FOREIGN_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID AS foreignMainCategoryId, sc.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME AS subCategoryName, mc.MAIN_CATEGORY_NAME AS mainCategoryName -- 메인 카테고리 이름 추가 FROM SubCategory sc JOIN MainCategory mc ON sc.FOREIGN_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = mc.MAIN_CATEGORY_ID WHERE sc.FOREIGN_MAIN_CATEGORY_ID = #{mainCategoryId}
